message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but I'm leaving you a decent chunk. Hopefully, we can reach an agreement quickly.
You're being generous, but I think I deserve a bit more. Let's meet in the middle.
Okay, I understand you want more. This is my final offer, let's be reasonable.
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. This is my best offer so far.
This is getting ridiculous. Let's split it down the middle and be done with it.
I'm not going to split it down the middle, I want more. This is my last offer before things get tough.
We're running out of time!  Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but this is my last offer before things get really tough.
I'm not going to back down now. I'm taking what I can get, and it's going to be a lot more than you're offering.
Okay, I'm getting desperate now. This is my last offer, or we both lose everything!
You're really running out of time. I'm not going to give you much, but I'm not going to walk away empty-handed either.
We're down to the wire! I'm willing to give you most of the money, but I need something to survive. This is my absolute final offer.
I'm not leaving with nothing. I'm taking 99.9% of the money. You can have the rest.
